kubejs.ponder.tag.custom_generators.desc: Special block placement to achieve different results
kubejs.ponder.custom_generators.text_1: This setup does not require water
kubejs.ponder.custom_generators.text_2: Place Smooth Quartz next to a lava source
kubejs.ponder.custom_generators.text_3: This setup will change the generator output to Diorite
kubejs.ponder.custom_generators.text_4: This setup will change the generator output to Granite
